sect1.title: Jena
sect1.para: The RDFBean Jena integration works on top of the DatasetGraph interface. It supports in it's current no inferencing and no Bean queries.

sect2.title: Getting started
sect2.para: To construct a Repository instance using Jena invoke the JenaRepository constructor with a Dataset instance.
